name: Project Discere
description:
Description

Project Discere is a dynamic 3D first person shooter game that uses live analytics to adjust gameplay as a player plays the game. Designed to imitate a multiplayer team-deathmatch game, players fight against AI to see what the game would be like if it were a multiplayer game.  To read about the project visit my blog at https://blog.projectdiscere.com/

Credits
  • Maxwell Zuber (Developer)
Controls
  • Movement: WASD
  • Sprint: Left Shift
  • Crouch: Left Control
  • Attack: Left Click
  • Aim: Right Click
  • Switch Weapons: 1,2,3
  • Flare: 4
  • Pause/Analytics: Escape
